channel.title: P Ring and attack speed
channel.description:
How do I make my p ring only work on players? It's only working on npc's. And I want to use it for those pesky mass clickers that mass click people in wildy...
And my attack speed, how do I make it go faster?

item.title: P Ring and attack speed
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

the attack speed… You probably can add something similar to:

if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == (ITEMID)) // p-ring { PkingDelay = 15; wepdelay = 15; }

where it says “ITEMID” change it to pring id, add it to client.java & you it should take 1.5 seconds.

And i have no idea what you mean with only working on npcs. makes no sense :S

Read full topic
